comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEST4B adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEST4B/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type ST4B model. This model is a variation of the Type ST3A model, with a proportional plus integral (PI) regulator block replacing the lag-lead regulator characteristic that is in the ST3A model. Both potential and compound source rectifier excitation systems are modeled.  The PI regulator blocks have non-windup limits that are represented. The voltage regulator of this model is typically implemented digitally.  Reference: IEEE Standard

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (K). Typical Value = 0.113. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kg
contents.comment: Feedback gain constant of the inner loop field regulator (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ki
contents.comment: Potential circuit gain coefficient (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kim
contents.comment: Voltage regulator integral gain output (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kir
contents.comment: Voltage regulator integral gain (K).  Typical Value = 10.75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Potential circuit gain coefficient (K).  Typical Value = 9.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpm
contents.comment: Voltage regulator proportional gain output (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpr
contents.comment: Voltage regulator proportional gain (K).  Typical Value = 10.75. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: ta
contents.comment: Voltage regulator time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0

contents.name: thetap
contents.comment: Potential circuit phase angle (thetap).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vbmax
contents.comment: Maximum excitation voltage (V).  Typical Value = 11.63. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmmax
contents.comment: Maximum inner loop output (V).  Typical Value = 99. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmmin
contents.comment: Minimum inner loop output (V).  Typical Value = -99. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -0.87. Default: 0.0

contents.name: xl
contents.comment: Reactance associated with potential source (X).  Typical Value = 0.124. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
